Class User

java.lang.Object
UserManagment.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Patient, Reception, Staff
public abstract class User extends Object
Represents a generic user in the system. This is an abstract class and serves as the base for different user roles like Doctor, Administrator, and Pharmacist.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Default constructor for User.

    • User

      public User(int userID, String password, String role, String name, String email, String contactNumber)
      Constructs a user with specified details.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique user ID.
      password - The password for the user.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., Doctor, Administrator).
      name - The name of the user.
      email - The email address of the user.
      contactNumber - The contact number of the user.

  • Method Details

    • checkUserIDExists

      public static boolean checkUserIDExists(int userID, String role)
      Checks if a given user ID exists for a specific role.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID to check.
      role - The role to check against.
      Returns:
      True if the user ID exists for the given role, otherwise false.

    • login

      public boolean login(int inputUserID, String inputPassword)
      Validates login credentials for a user.
      Parameters:
      inputUserID - The entered user ID.
      inputPassword - The entered password.
      Returns:
      True if the credentials match, otherwise false.

    • loadDoctorFromFile

      public static Doctor loadDoctorFromFile(int userID, String password, AppointmentManager appointmentManager)
      Loads a Doctor object from the staff file if credentials match.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID of the doctor.
      password - The password of the doctor.
      appointmentManager - The AppointmentManager instance to associate with the doctor.
      Returns:
      A Doctor object if found, otherwise null.

    • loadAdministratorFromFile

      public static Administrator loadAdministratorFromFile(int userID, String password, Inventory inventory, AppointmentManager appointmentManager)
      Loads an Administrator object from the staff file if credentials match.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID of the administrator.
      password - The password of the administrator.
      inventory - The Inventory instance to associate with the administrator.
      appointmentManager - The AppointmentManager instance to associate with the administrator.
      Returns:
      An Administrator object if found, otherwise null.

    • loadPharmacistFromFile

      public static Pharmacist loadPharmacistFromFile(int userID, String password, Inventory inventory)
      Loads a Pharmacist object from the staff file if credentials match.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID of the pharmacist.
      password - The password of the pharmacist.
      inventory - The Inventory instance to associate with the pharmacist.
      Returns:
      A Pharmacist object if found, otherwise null.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks equality between this user and another object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare with.
      Returns:
      True if the other object is a User with the same user ID, otherwise false.

    • updatePasswordInFile

      private boolean updatePasswordInFile(String newPassword)
      Updates the user's password in the staff file.
      Parameters:
      newPassword - The new password to set.
      Returns:
      True if the password update is successful, otherwise false.

    • displayMenu

      public abstract void displayMenu()
      Displays the role-specific menu for the user. Must be implemented by subclasses.
